fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.manager

Interface DeviceAccessPolicyMgr


  • public interface DeviceAccessPolicyMgr
    This service manages application access rights to devices.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DependAccessRights addDependency(DeviceDependency deviceDependency)
      Adds the specified application device dependency.

      • addDependency

        DependAccessRights addDependency(DeviceDependency deviceDependency)
        Adds the specified application device dependency.
        Parameters:
        deviceDependency - a device dependency
        Returns:
        a handle on the application rights for this device dependency
